application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: The submitted details  of an enhanced sound insulation in pursuant to condition 10 of planning application Ref: 234650FUL dated 29.02.2024 are deemed to be unsatisfactory and do not meet the requirements of the condition. The proposal would therefore fail to comply with policies 7A & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies 1.1 and 1.2 of the Ealing Development (Core) Strategy (2012), policies D6 and D14 of the London Plan (2021), the National Planning Policy Framework (2023), Ealing SPG10 and Standard 30 London Housing SPG 2016.
description: Details of an enhanced sound insulation pursuant to conditions 10 of planning permission reference 234650FUL dated 29.02.2024 'Conversion of single dwellinghouse to three self-contained flats; single storey side and rear extension'
